alert.note: Alert for Fayette Ridges; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued February 24 at 12:00PM EST until February 25 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing expected. Total ice accumulations up to four tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Higher Elevations of Fayette and Higher Elevations of Westmoreland Counties. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening and Friday morning commutes.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
